p: In this dataset, we present a shapefile with one-kilometer grid (~0.0083°) for the country of Nepal and include 36 different variables we created ( Table 1). Among them, 13 variables are created from different secondary databases from various sources. These 13 variables underwent different statistical treatments so as to derive the rest of the variables. Please refer to our article [1] for the data sources and detailed procedures of data processing. We based part of our methodology to create these variables on the approach employed by de Sherbinin et al. [2].
